summary:
I am a seasoned senior marketing and transformation leader with 25+ years of sales and marketing experience in the IT industry. I pride myself on my ability to get things done – within and across functional teams – by being a trusted advisor. My approach builds bridges between sales (the voice of the customer) and marketing (our value offer for customers). This is how I build teams, drive collaboration and lead growth. 

I began my journey as a Citrix integration partner, winning the Citrix Benelux Best Marketing Programme Award twice. That led to my joining Citrix as the Benelux Marketing Manager. Over the course of almost 20 years, I’ve held various field and demand marketing roles of increasing scope and impact – from Benelux, to Western Europe to EMEA-wide.  The last 6 years during my Citrix tenure, I headed up the Citrix EMEA field marketing organisation – a world class team of modern marketing professionals where data and metric driven behaviour creates digital marketing generated demand. 

Today I am Head of Check Point Field Marketing EMEA as a transformational leader and apply the business values in my daily work whilst migrating the field marketing team to a full service oriented business unit embracing all instruments available to the modern field marketer.

Over time I learned what is important to me. My career journey made me experience the values of integrity, humility, respect and conviction. Those values are important for me and are a guide through my professional journey. As a passionate team player, I love to work with people sharing the same values and achieving goals together. Additionally, I need an environment where being curious, taking ownership and accountability are in the organisation's’ DNA. 

Key to my success is optimizing and accelerated contribution to our sales pipeline by developing and executing an aligned field marketing strategy and operating budget across EMEA.

projects.description: Led the internal end to end lead management workgroup with the purpose to increase bottom-line results. projects.title: Citrix World Port Tournament Baseball
projects.description: In 2013 we took the opportunity to become name giver head sponsor to the established Rotterdam World Port Tournament (Baseball). The objectie was two fold: create more brand awareness for Citrix (in the Netherlands and beyond) and being able to invite reselling and alliance partners and end user customers in the skybox during the tournament to tighten relationships. The WPT with participants from Curaçao, Cuba, Taiwan and the Netherlands and media coverage in these countries as well as in the USA and Japan, offered a great opportunity to bring business and sports together and raise awareness for the Citrix brand. Citrix enjoyed a lot of media coverage up to the event as well as during the event including national daily newspapers. During 8 days Citrix was able to have their partners as well as end user customers joining them in the skybox to meet in an informal and inspiring environment.
